short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Team time tracking software with automatic screenshots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TeamLogger is a time-tracking and activity level monitoring software with automatic screen capture feature. TeamLogger helps you keep track of how your employees spend their time. It also allows you to monitor their screen while they are working. Employers and and managers can view reports, time-sheets and screenshots on their TeamLogger dashboard.
